data.title: Eric Frank Russell
data.meta_description: Kingswood, Surrey: The World's Work 1913 Ltd, 1943 . Octavo, pp. 1-2 i-ii iii-iv 1-135 136-138: blank note: first and last leaves used as front and rear paste-downs , publisher's yellow cloth, spine panel stamped in black. First edition. The author's first book. Anatomy of Wonder 2004 II-942. Survey of Science Fiction Literature V, pp. 2075-78. In 333. Tiny owner's name dated
data.text:
Russell, Eric Frank. SINISTER BARRIER. Kingswood, Surrey: The World's Work (1913) Ltd, [1943]. Octavo, pp. [1-2] [i-ii] iii-iv 1-135 [136-138: blank] [note: first and last leaves used as front and rear paste-downs], publisher's yellow cloth, spine panel stamped in black. First edition. The author's first book. Anatomy of Wonder (2004) II-942. Survey of Science Fiction Literature V, pp. 2075-78. In 333. Tiny owner's name dated 1944 at the top edge of the title page. A fine copy in very good dust jacket, priced five shillings on the front flap, with light wear and several short closed tears and associated creases at edges and shallow chip from upper spine end. An attractive, better than average copy of this book. Scarce in dust jacket. (#170991).

Price: $450.00
